title: I have player League for 24 hours shy of 2000 hours...
body:
and Janna was the second Champion I unlocked. Yet it only occurred to me last game to use Monsoon to knock enemies away from a turret.

When was the last time you realised something obvious about a champion you've had for ages?

replies.body:
insec them INTO the turret fool.

flash Rs are the most broken thing about janna!

also, its really fun to cancel your heal part of ult and get allies killed if they are trolling douches.

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ELtwlMTt,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-30T11:56:24.232+0000)
>
> insec them INTO the turret fool.
> 
> flash Rs are the most broken thing about janna!
> 
> also, its really fun to cancel your heal part of ult and get allies killed if they are trolling douches.

Usually when there is 5 of them beating down they don't give jack being just that little closer though. I could push some of them into the turret but then if my team doesn't follow up then flash, ult and me and tower are dead for nothing. At least that is what I would expect from yoloq.
yeah well they are 2 completely different situations. still, insec ults are the best ults on janna. splitting up teams.
Ori + ball on herself + ult + flash into enemy team instantly after ulting = no ult animation so the ult can't be dodged unless you flash away at the same time Ori flashes in
irelias ult, each time you use it sheen passive gets activated, took me about 30 whole games before i realised that, didn't matter though, still did crazy damage
